items.creator: 47thpresident
items.summary: 文章标题为“Publish on your own site, syndicate elsewhere”，文章内容主要介绍了POSSE（Publish on your own site, Syndicate elsewhere）的理念，即先在自己的网站上发布内容，再将其分发到其他平台。这一策略有助于提高内容的可访问性和影响力，同时保持对内容的控制。文章还讨论了该理念的优势和实施方法，并提供了相关讨论链接。

items.title: The rsync algorithm (1996) [pdf]
items.contentSnippet:
Article URL: https://www.andrew.cmu.edu/course/15-749/READINGS/required/cas/tridgell96.pdf
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46466734
Points: 209
# Comments: 43
items.creator: vortex_ape
items.summary: 文章介绍rsync算法（1996年）。该算法是一种高效的数据传输工具，通过局部文件差异检测和增量传输技术，实现快速同步。它利用hash校验和快速查找算法优化性能，减少网络带宽和存储资源消耗。文章详细阐述了算法原理和实现细节，适用于需要高效数据同步的场景。

items.title: Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2026)
items.content:
Please state the location and include REMOTE for remote work, REMOTE (US) or similar if the country is restricted, and ONSITE when remote work is not an option.

Please only post if you personally are part of the hiring company—no recruiting firms or job boards. One post per company. If it isn't a household name, explain what your company does.

Please only post if you are actively filling a position and are committed to responding to applicants.

Commenters: please don't reply to job posts to complain about something. It's off topic here.

Readers: please only email if you are personally interested in the job.

Searchers: try https://dheerajck.github.io/hnwhoishiring/, http://nchelluri.github.io/hnjobs/, https://hnresumetojobs.com, https://hnhired.fly.dev, https://kennytilton.github.io/whoishiring/, https://hnjobs.emilburzo.com, or this (unofficial) Chrome extension: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/hn-hiring-pro/mpfal....

Don't miss this other fine thread: Who wants to be hired? https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46466073

Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46466074

Points: 343

# Comments: 217
items.contentSnippet:

items.creator: whoishiring
items.summary:
文章标题：Ask HN: Who is hiring? (January 2026)

摘要：本文为Hacker News的招聘板块，邀请公司发布招聘信息，要求注明工作地点（远程、美国远程或现场），仅限招聘公司本人发布，需说明公司业务。评论区禁止投诉，读者需自行联系感兴趣职位。提供多个招聘资源链接供参考。

items.title: IPv6 just turned 30 and still hasn't taken over the world
items.contentSnippet:
Article URL: https://www.theregister.com/2025/12/31/ipv6_at_30/
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46465327
Points: 564
# Comments: 1118
items.creator: Brajeshwar
items.summary: IPv6已启用30年，但仍未全面取代IPv4。尽管推出多年，全球IPv6部署率依然较低，多数网络仍依赖IPv4。专家指出，IPv6普及面临技术、成本及用户习惯等多重挑战。

items.title: Parental controls aren't for parents

items.summary:

摘要：文章指出家长控制工具通常由技术公司开发，但设计上可能忽视了父母的实际需求。这些工具往往过于复杂或缺乏灵活性，导致父母难以有效使用。文章认为，家长控制应更注重用户体验，以真正帮助父母管理孩子的数字生活。
